title: (x) Red Bull Creativity Contest website typography - FF Meta {Marc O, Rainer}
content:
This sample is from a red bull campaign site produced by group94. Could someone help me identify the font. Thank you!  
Petter

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064730im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typo_5556.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Likewise logo sans serif w/ rounded "w" - House Chalet {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064730/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40081 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Dockside Green logo - Sansa {Pieter} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064730/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40071 "Go to next forum topic")
author: plojel

comments.content:
FF Meta Book, to be precise:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_meta\_1/?sample\_text=...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064730/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_meta_1/?sample_text=can%20you%20be%20creative&sample_size=36 "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_meta\_1/?sample\_text=can%20you%20be%20creative&sample\_size=36")
FF Meta, the older Sans of the younger serif-version above.
Haha, fastest ever? Thank you Marc and Renko for you speedy help.
I’d love to see the site if you’ve got a link.

Just go to [Group94.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064730/http:/group94.com/), there’ll probably be a link there.

Wait, here it is: [Red Bull Creativity Contest](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064730/http:/archive.group94.com/redbullcreativitycontest/).
